original: Kristiansson, Albert Sten, läroverksadjunkt, Uddevalla, f. 5/10/84 i Halmstad av Carl Johan K. o. Johanna Nils-dotter. G. 16 m. Vera Lundell. Barn: Ivar f. 22, civ:ing., Sthlm. — Mog:ex. i Halmstad 04, fil. kand. i Lund 06, prov-år i Lund 10-11. Extrailär. i Hailmstad 06-07 viik. adj. i Visby 07-08, vik. lektor i Karlskr. 08, i Växjö 09-10, extralär. i Lund 11-12, adj. i modersm., hist. o. geogr. v. Uddevalla h. a. 1. sed. 12, tf. bibi. där 14, ord. dito sed. 20. Led. av stadsbibi :styr. fr. 14, ordf. där 38, led. av folksk:styr. 17-39, museistyr. fr. 19, ordf. där 28-34 o. intend. fr. 36, led. av styr. f. Gbgs o. Boh. läns fornm:fören. samt stadshist. inst., ordf. i styr. f. prakt, melllansk. fr. 22, tryckfrih rombud fr. 38. Resor t. Tyskl., Belg. o. Frankr. 14, Tyskl. o. Schweiz 35, Danm. o. Norge uppr. -ggr. Skr.: Uddevalla iskolas hist. före 1906 (M), Dito 1806-1873 (37), Uddevalla Sparbank 1836-1936 (36), Bidrag t. Uddevalla hist. I-III (36-40), Uddevalla på Karl XII:s tid (38), Uddevalla stadsfullm. 1863-1938 (38), Världskriget i bild I-VII (41-47) m. m. RVO.
translated: Kristiansson, Albert Sten, secondary school teacher, Uddevalla, b. 5/10/84 in Halmstad to Carl Johan K. and Johanna Nils-dotter. M. on 16 with Vera Lundell. Children: Ivar b. 22, civil engineer, Stockholm. - Completed high school in Halmstad 04, bachelor of arts in Lund 06, probationary year in Lund 10-11. Extra teacher in Hailmstad 06-07, temporary assistant teacher in Visby 07-08, temporary lecturer in Karlskr. 08, in Växjö 09-10, extra teacher in Lund 11-12, assistant teacher in mother tongue, history, and geography at Uddevalla h. a. 1st since 12, acting librarian there in 14, regular librarian since 20. Member of the city library board from 14, chairman there in 38, member of the public school board from 17-39, museum board from 19, chairman there from 28-34 and curator from 36, member of the board of the Gothenburg and Bohus County Antiquarian Society and the City Historical Institute, chairman of the board of the practical middle school from 22, freedom of the press representative from 38. Travelled to Germany, Belgium, and France in 14, Germany and Switzerland in 35, Denmark and Norway several times. Writings: Uddevalla school's history before 1906 (M), Same from 1806-1873 (37), Uddevalla Savings Bank 1836-1936 (36), Contributions to Uddevalla history I-III (36-40), Uddevalla in Karl XII's time (38), Uddevalla city council 1863-1938 (38), World War in pictures I-VII (41-47), etc. RVO.
